src:
Real Madrid Hidupkan Minat untuk Mohamed Salah
04 Nov 2019, 21:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub La Liga, Real Madrid berencana menambah amunisi lini serang mereka. El Real disebut bakal mencoba merekrut Mohamed Salah dari Liverpool.
Dua musim terakhir, Salah bisa dikatakan menjadi bintang utama Liverpool. Kecemerlangan pemain asal Mesir itu membuat Liverpool memenangkan trofi Liga Champions musim lalu.
Performa apik eks pemain AS Roma itu menarik perhatian sejumlah klub top Eropa. Real Madrid diberitakan menjadi salah satu tim yang sempat mencoba memboyong Salah di musim panas kemarin, meski gagal.
Don Balon mengklaim bahwa Real Madrid masih tertarik merekrut Salah. Mereka berencana untuk merekrut sang pemain di tahun 2020.

Mengapa Madrid kembali mencoba merekrut Salah? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Real Madrid Turn on Interests for Mohamed Salah
Nov 04 2019, 21:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - La Liga club Real Madrid plan to increase their attack line ammunition. El Real is said to be trying to recruit Mohamed Salah from Liverpool.
The last two seasons, Salah can be said to be Liverpool's main star. The brilliance of the Egyptian player made Liverpool win the Champions League trophy last season.
The slick performance of the former AS Roma player attracted the attention of a number of top European clubs. Real Madrid reported to be one of the teams that had tried to bring Salah last summer, despite failing.
Don Balon claims that Real Madrid are still interested in recruiting Salah. They plan to recruit the player in 2020.

Why is Madrid trying to recruit Salah again? Check out the information below.
